title: PROJECT HOODIE
body: Hey it's already November and still no update on project hoodies? Is this going to end up being like kickstarter where they write estimated time October 2016 but you don't get until a year after? Didn't expect Riot Games to have delays in getting everyone's order shipped out.

replies.body: I'm not too familiar with much of merchandise on-goings, and I totally missed that preorder.  :X  I looked into this for you, and it seems that there's been some production delays due to Hurricane Matthew.  Shipping is currently aimed for early November, with shipping confirmation to be  sent.  An email detailing this was sent as well, but you can also reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to confirm what I've said here.  Hope that helps!

Here's an update:

https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1777497769154952&substory_index=0&id=1557966024441462&__tn__=%2As

I found this on the riot games merch Facebook page. 

TLDR: pretty much going to be at the warehouse last Thursday, should be shipping after that, so expect to get the hoodie about 1-2 weeks after that date, give or take a few days for the holidays.

They said they would keep updates on their Facebook page, so I would check/send there if there are questions.

yeah they said November for me as well, going into dec. and still haven't heard anything new.
rather sad about it honestly... first time ive ever bought a physical merch before and im def. not happy with it at all. half tempted to cancel it by now but chances of me being able to get money back is prolly slim. As sad as that is to say. Wont be buying anything else any time soon thats for sure.

I would buy a project Talon hoodie. *hint*hint*wink*wink* ;)
 (Pls)
I sent a support ticket about this. They said there were some delays and that it should ship sometime November. Patience my young Padawan.
